mng: to give in to, to be swayed by (personal considerations etc), Taiwan pr. [xun2], to follow, to expose publicly, variant of 侚[xun4], variant of 殉[xun4]

exm.mng: to bend the law in order to favor one's relatives or associates (idiom)
to act out of personal considerations, to show partiality
see 徇私枉法[xun4 si1 wang3 fa3]
